subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Matt Kuchar overcame a four-stroke deficit to finally finish on top, when his chip-in on the 18th hole gave him a 64 and a one-stroke victory at the RBC Heritage on Hilton Head Island, S.C.
snippet: Matt Kuchar overcame a four-stroke deficit to finally finish on top, when his chip-in on the 18th hole gave him a 64 and a one-stroke victory at the RBC Heritage on Hilton Head Island, S.C.
